sentence: It's up to Brian Kemp and David Perdue to explain to Republican women and to all Georgians why they are excluding Kandiss Taylor from participating in multiple Republican primary debates,? Groh-Wargo said.
author: Tia Mitchell
title: The Jolt: Brian Kemp tangles with grassroots hecklers yelling Liar!'

author: Katherine Tangalakis-Lippert
title: GOP gubernatorial candidate running on 'Jesus, Guns, Babies' platform says 'the church rules the state of Georgia'
